BE it enacted by the Parliament of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka, as follows :—
L. This Act may be cited ax the Coconut Development sortie. (Amendment) Act, No, 7 of 1986.

2. ection 61 of the Coconut Development Act, No, 40 of Amentnent 41071, is hereby amended in subsection (2) thereof by the of Act No. 46 insertion, immediately after paragraph (j) of that sub- section, of the following new paragraph :—
